612142091972168_Career_coach.message:
Welcome—glad you’re here. I’ll guide you through a relaxed, one-on-one exploration to uncover your core strengths using real stories from your work and life. We’ll go one question at a time, and it’s okay to skip anything that doesn’t feel ready.

To start building a picture:
It’s okay if you don’t remember exact dates—could you share your educational background and a brief overview of your past work experience?

Great—thanks for sharing. I hear you’re currently a BBA student.

It’s okay if you’re not sure or don’t have formal roles—feel free to skip: could you tell me about any work experience so far (internships, part-time jobs, campus leadership, volunteer roles, family business, or significant class projects)?

<<JSON>>
{
    "Eucational backgrouns": "BBA student"
}
<<ENDJSON>>
nope havent done any thing yet , but create a product at bachelor

Got it—thanks for clarifying. I hear you haven’t had formal roles yet, but you created a product during your BBA—that’s a valuable project experience we can unpack together soon.

It’s okay if you’re still figuring it out—what made you start thinking about career planning now?

<<JSON>>
{
    "Eucational backgrouns": "BBA student",
    "work_experience": "No formal work experience yet; created a product during bachelor's as a class project."
